00054 struct ec_domain
00055 {
00056     struct list_head list; 
00057     ec_master_t *master; 
00058     unsigned int index; 
00060     struct list_head fmmu_configs; 
00061     size_t data_size; 
00062     uint8_t *data; 
00063     ec_origin_t data_origin; 
00064     uint32_t logical_base_address; 
00066     struct list_head datagram_pairs; 
00068     uint16_t working_counter[EC_MAX_NUM_DEVICES]; 
00070     uint16_t expected_working_counter; 
00071     unsigned int working_counter_changes; 
00073     unsigned int redundancy_active; 
00074     unsigned long notify_jiffies; 
00075 };
